name: Warriors: Apprenticeship
description:
You are ThunderClan's newest apprentice. Choose your name, appearance, and destiny and become the warrior — or medicine cat — you were meant to be. Hunt, heal, patrol, fight, and care for the elders to earn renown to complete your apprenticeship. Or risk losing your Clan status by stealing prey and herbs or invading other Clans' territories. Will you receive your warrior name, or be cast out from your Clan?

Controls:

  • Move: A/D or horizontal arrow keys
  • Jump: Space or W or Up
  • Interact: E
  • Attack: Enter or Shift
  • Menu: Escape
  • Interact with Buttons: Left Click

Known Bugs:

  • Player's input name can be blank instead of assigning itself to the default name.
  • Sometimes upon killing prey, the player's healthbar will go down. This is just a visual error; player health is not lowered upon prey death.

Changelog:

  • 1.01: fixed a bug where saving and quitting continued the game rather than quitting out of the game.

WebGL Build: Doesn't work on itch.io for some reason, so if you really need a browser version, try downloading it and running the index.html file.
